main.name: Daniel Son
main.description: I am a BizOps Sales & Marketing Finance Strategist Excel Wizard Entrepreneur. After graduating from UVA with a MS in Finance, I gained about $450M of M&A and Private Placement deal experience at an Investment Bank.
main.bio: My industry experience ranges across B2B Enterprise Software, SaaS, Big Data / AI / Machine Learning, EdTech, ERP, SCM, and Cybersecurity. Since then, I've worked as a Manager of Pre-Sales at a Big Data AI Supply Chain startup, and as a Sr. Financial Analyst at a MarTech startup.
main.contactmessage: Send me a note if you'd like to get into contact!

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
